title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build robust data foundations to power enterprise AI and BI (BIZ331)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建强大的数据基础以支持企业AI和BI (BIZ331)
abstract: Discover how organizations build robust and scalable data foundations that power AI agents, automation, and BI analytics at enterprise scale. Join a customer as they share how they modernize their analytics environment with Amazon Quick Suite, enabling governed, high-performance insights across their business. Learn best practices for designing reliable data pipelines and architectures that support conversational AI, analytical agents, and business intelligence workloads.Explore strategies for unifying AI and BI data systems to deliver trusted insights, accelerate innovation and drive smarter decisions at scale.
abstract_cn: 了解组织如何构建强大且可扩展的数据基础，以支持企业级的AI代理、自动化和BI分析。与客户一起分享他们如何使用Amazon Quick Suite现代化其分析环境，实现跨业务的受治理、高性能洞察。学习设计可靠数据管道和架构的最佳实践，以支持对话式AI、分析代理和商业智能工作负载。探索统一AI和BI数据系统的策略，以提供可信的洞察、加速创新并在规模化场景下推动更明智的决策。

presenter.name: Thomas Schlosser
presenter.title: Manager, Specialist Solutions Architecture - Amazon Quick Suite

presenter.name: Emily Zhu
presenter.title: Sr. Product Manager, Amazon Quick Suite, AWS
